remarks:
The Null Set Axiom of ZF set theory.  It was derived as ~ axnul above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2003.) 

---

 The Null Set Axiom of IZF set theory.  It was derived as ~ axnul above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily.  Axiom 4 of [Crosilla] p. "Axioms of CZF and IZF".  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2003.)
statement:
ax-nul $p |- E. x A. y -. y e. x $.
$d x y $.
